certificates.cissp: CISSP Certified Information Systems Security Professional

secureHomeLab.title: Secure Home Lab
secureHomeLab.description: Built a secure environment with pfSense, Active Directory, pentesting tools, monitoring, and digital forensics.

sections.0: Network configuration with pfSense to create isolated VLANs and secure traffic.
sections.1: Deployment of Active Directory and integration of clients and servers.
sections.2: Pentesting Active Directory with Kali Linux.
sections.3: Deployment of Splunk to monitor logs and AD activities.
sections.4: Using Tsurugi Linux for incident response and digital forensics (DFIR).

cloudSIEM.title: Cloud-native SIEM (AWS)
cloudSIEM.description: Designed a full SOC stack (TheHive, Cortex, Elasticsearch, MISP) with Docker; integrated threat intelligence and automated incident enrichment.

sections.0: GuardDuty enabled to monitor EC2 instances for suspicious access attempts...
sections.1: Lambda function restructures GuardDuty findings and sends them to S3 and TheHive.
sections.2: EventBridge rule triggers Lambda on GuardDuty findings.
sections.3: SQS configured for async communication from Lambda to the main instance.
sections.4: Containers deployed via Docker Compose (TheHive on port 9000).
sections.5: Cortex accessible on port 9001 for automated analysis.
sections.6: MISP for storing and sharing threat indicators.
sections.7: Cortex + MISP fully integrated with TheHive for enrichment.
sections.8: TheHive manages incidents as structured cases.
sections.9: VirusTotal analyzer in Cortex enriches observables.
sections.10: Cloudflare responder in Cortex automates IP blocking.
sections.11: MISP correlates observables to detect known threats.
sections.12: Kibana visualizes dashboards of TheHive cases.

aiRecruitmentApp.title: Intelligent Recruitment App
aiRecruitmentApp.description: Web app using AI to analyze CVs, score candidates, and simulate asynchronous job interviews.

sections.0: Two user roles: Candidate and Company with dedicated features.
sections.1: Company dashboard with job offer and interview management.
sections.2: List of job offers posted by the company.
sections.4: Apply to offers and track applications in real time.
sections.5: Cross-encoder model compares CV and offer for match scoring.
sections.6: Status updated to 'Interview' if score is high.
sections.7: Asynchronous video interview with recorded answers.

esxi-vcenter.title: Setup of a Virtualized Environment
esxi-vcenter.description: Building a complete virtualized infrastructure using VMware ESXi and vCenter Server, including the deployment and configuration of essential network services.

sections.0: Installation and initial configuration of vCenter Server to centralize and manage ESXi hosts and virtual machines efficiently
sections.1: Creation and setup of virtual machines with proper network configurations to ensure communication between VMs and external networks
sections.2: Deployment of an FTP server within a VM, allowing file sharing and testing secure file transfer between different virtual machines
sections.3: Setup of the Apache2 web server on a Linux virtual machine, hosting web content and enabling basic web services in the virtualized environment
sections.4: Configuration of SSH service on Linux VMs, securing remote access by disabling password authentication and enforcing key-based authentication for enhanced security

cbac-django.title: CBAC App
cbac-django.description: Development of a web app implementing content-based access control combined with AI to analyze post content and apply age restrictions.

sections.0: The homepage presents the key features of the platform, including AI-powered content filtering and secure posting options
sections.1: An interface where users can create and share posts, whether text, images, or videos, with automatic content analysis applied before publication
sections.2: The content view page for adult users, allowing unrestricted access to all published posts, including those with sensitive material
sections.3: The content view page for minor users, where only safe, public posts are displayed, and sensitive or inappropriate content is automatically restricted

haac.title: Hardening as Code
haac.description: Static and dynamic hardening for Linux systems with scripts and Ansible automation

sections.0: Project architecture where the main script orchestrates static and dynamic hardening tasks
sections.1: Static hardening script interacting with users for confirmation before applying changes
sections.2: Dynamic hardening to automatically adapt based on system status
sections.3: Auditing system security by testing and validating applied hardening measures
sections.4: Monitoring and checking the system's current security status
sections.5: Automating all hardening processes using Ansible playbooks

web-servers-security.title: Web Servers Security
web-servers-security.description: Built a secure network in GNS3 to protect a web server using firewalls, proxies, and security appliances

sections.0: Set up FortiGate firewall policies and implemented a DMZ to isolate the web servers from internal networks
sections.1: Configured a reverse proxy to manage incoming traffic and hide the real IP adress of the backend server
sections.2: Deployed FortiWeb for advanced web application protection and threat detection
sections.3: Conducted tests to verify the effectiveness of all security measures in place

glucocare.title: GlucoCare web App
glucocare.description: Developed a secure web app where patients and doctors can track diabetes data, communicate, and manage treatment effectively

sections.0: Patient dashboard showing features like profile, notifications, notes, and health data tracking
sections.1: Interface for patients to create and manage personal health notes
sections.2: Graph displaying blood glucose levels before and after meals
sections.3: Personalized chatbot to assist patients with diabetes-related questions
sections.4: Doctor's dashboard to manage and monitor patient information
sections.5: Doctor's view of patients' profiles, notes history, and blood glucose graphs
sections.6: Doctor setting personalized reminders for patients
sections.7: Chat system for scheduling consultations between patients and doctors
